Package simulation

Class AvailabilityMethods

java.lang.Object
simulation.AvailabilityMethods
public class AvailabilityMethods extends Object
This class implements the different methods to calculate the availability of machines.
Author:
Florian Korn

  • Method Details

    • calcAvailOneMachine

      public static double calcAvailOneMachine(Machine machines)
      This method calculates the availability of a single machine.
      Parameters:
      r - the probability to be repaired at the beginning of the period
      f - the probability to fail at the beginning of each period, if it was running at the end of the period before
      Returns:
      the availability of a single machine

    • calcAvailAllMachines

      public static double calcAvailAllMachines(Machine[] machines)
      This method calculates the availability of a set of machines.
      Parameters:
      machines - is a set of machines to calculate with
      Returns:
      the availability of all machines in a set

    • calcAvailOnePlus

      public static double calcAvailOnePlus(Machine[] machines)
      This method calculates the probability of at minimum one machine available.
      Parameters:
      machines - is a set of machines to calculate with
      Returns:
      the availability of at least one machine available
